### <a name="resolv_conf"></a>`resolv_conf`

== Class: resolv_conf

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `resolv_conf` class:

* [`nameservers`](#-resolv_conf--nameservers)
* [`config_file`](#-resolv_conf--config_file)
* [`config_template`](#-resolv_conf--config_template)
* [`use_resolvconf`](#-resolv_conf--use_resolvconf)
* [`update_cmd`](#-resolv_conf--update_cmd)
* [`package`](#-resolv_conf--package)
* [`manage_package`](#-resolv_conf--manage_package)
* [`package_ensure`](#-resolv_conf--package_ensure)
* [`domainname`](#-resolv_conf--domainname)

##### <a name="-resolv_conf--nameservers"></a>`nameservers`

Data type: `Array`

List of nameservers

##### <a name="-resolv_conf--config_file"></a>`config_file`

Data type: `String`

Config file

##### <a name="-resolv_conf--config_template"></a>`config_template`

Data type: `String`

Config template to use

##### <a name="-resolv_conf--use_resolvconf"></a>`use_resolvconf`

Data type: `Boolean`

Wether or not to use resolvconf

##### <a name="-resolv_conf--update_cmd"></a>`update_cmd`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

Update command to load resolv.conf.
Only needed on some OS

##### <a name="-resolv_conf--package"></a>`package`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

Name of the package to install

##### <a name="-resolv_conf--manage_package"></a>`manage_package`

Data type: `Boolean`

Wether or not a package should be managed

##### <a name="-resolv_conf--package_ensure"></a>`package_ensure`

Data type: `String`

Ensure the state of the managed package

##### <a name="-resolv_conf--domainname"></a>`domainname`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

Local domain name

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-resolv_conf--searchpath"></a>`searchpath`

Data type: `Variant[Array[String],String]`

Search list for host-name lookup

Default value: `[]`

##### <a name="-resolv_conf--options"></a>`options`

Data type: `Optional[Array]`

Modify certain internal resolver variables

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-resolv_conf--mode"></a>`mode`

Data type: `String`

Config file mode

Default value: `'0644'`
